results.content:
Very good. I have courses on Git. 
This is my Git starting point. 
The Tutor is very concise and to the point. 
Would recommend plus I'll be checking out Kalob's others. Thanks.

results.content: This was an amazing and very helpful lesson. The course was on creating  Github pages but I actually learned other helpful tips for using Github. Just what I needed! Thank you, Kalob!
